Generalised linear mixed model (GLIMMIX).

$Revision: 205 $

Oliver Mannion

Constructor Detail

Glimmix

public Glimmix(CDataCacheContainer container)
        throws CDataGridException
Construct Glimmix from casper container. The container must have a string column called "Effect" which specifies the variable name, and a double column called "Estimate" which specifies the variables coefficient.

Parameters:
container - casper container
Throws:
CDataGridException - if problem reading container
Method Detail

sumOfProducts

public double sumOfProducts(Map<String,? extends Number> values)
Calculates the sum of the product of supplied values joined with the effect estimates (coefficients) stored in this model.

Parameters:
values - set of values with same names as this model. These values are multiplied with the model's effect estimates (coefficients).
Returns:
sum

evaluateLogitProb

public double evaluateLogitProb(Map<String,? extends Number> values,
                                double gamma)
Evaluate the logit probability of sumOfProducts(Map) of values. Probability = exp(logit)/(1+exp(logit)) where logit = sumOfProducts(values) + gamma.

Parameters:
values - set of values with same names as this model. These values are multiplied with the model's effect estimates (coefficients).
gamma - gamma to add to the sum of products
Returns:
logit probability

binaryLogitDraw

public int binaryLogitDraw(Map<String,? extends Number> values,
                           double gamma,
                           RNG random)
Evaluate logit probability then randomly draw a number from a uniform distribution and compare to the logit probability. If random.nextUniform01() <= logitProb ? 1 : 2.

Parameters:
values - set of values with same names as this model. These values are multiplied with the model's effect estimates (coefficients).
gamma - gamma to add to the sum of products
random - random number generator
Returns:
random.nextUniform01() <= prob ? 1 : 2.

evaluateInteger

public int evaluateInteger(Map<String,? extends Number> values,
                           double gamma,
                           boolean limit,
                           int min,
                           int max)
Return Math.exp(sumOfProducts(Map). If value is outside min or max, it will be set to the min/max if limit = true.

Parameters:
values - set of values with same names as this model. These values are multiplied with the model's effect estimates (coefficients).
gamma - gamma to add to the sum of products
limit - toggle to determine whether min/max limits are applied.
min - min limit. If limit = true results less than min will be returned as min.
max - max limit. If limit = true results greater than max will be returned as max.
Returns:
integer value

getEffectEstimates

public Map<String,Double> getEffectEstimates()
Get underlying map of effect names and estimates.

Returns:
effect estimates.

public String toString()
